description: Peacock’s new TV and movie releases for January 6-12 2025 include Deal or No Deal Island Season 2 and The Traitors Season 3. Deal or No Deal Island Season 2 makes its way to Peacock on January 8. Hosted by actor Joe Manganiello, this reality game show sees contestants take part in a series of […] The post Peacock Schedule January 6-12 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.

excerpt: If you are curious about Peacock's schedule for January 6-12 2025, you can find the list of movie and TV show releases here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Peacock’s new TV and movie releases for January 6-12 2025 include Deal or No Deal Island Season 2 and The Traitors Season 3. Deal or No Deal Island Season 2 makes its way to Peacock on January 8. Hosted by actor Joe Manganiello, this reality game show sees contestants take part in a series of tough challenges. They have to find hidden briefcases worth over $200 million, before facing the banker himself in the ultimate challenge. The winner is the person who has managed to defeat the banker and receives the ultimate cash prize. Then, on January 9, the first three episodes of The Traitors Season 3 drop on Peacock. This game show is hosted by Alan Cumming at an ancient Scottish castle. Here, contestants called “faithfuls” work together in a series of challenges to build a prize fund worth $250,000. They must also contend with some contestants hidden amongst faithfuls, branded “traitors,” whose goal is to eliminate them and claim the prize money for themselves. Also dropping this week on Peacock is Polar Opposites. This Hallmark movie follows Emma, who ends up traveling to South America, with the ultimate goal of reaching Antarctica to see her father. Unable to get on a boat to Antarctica, she stows away on a cruise ship, where she meets the engineer, Andy. New Peacock releases for January 6-12 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Peacock from January 6-12 2025. January 6 When Calls The Heart, Season 12 – Premiere January 7 Snapped – Season 35 – Premiere (Oxygen) Watch What Happens Live, Season 22 – Premiere (Bravo) January 8 Deal or No Deal Island, Season 2 – Premiere (NBC) Deal or No Deal Island After Show, Season 1 – Premiere (NBC)  January 9 The Traitors – Season 3 Premiere, 3 Episodes January 10 The Jane Mysteries: A Deadly Prescription January 12 Polar Opposites For more Peacock content, here is the trailer for Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy. Also, here is who has replaced Jessica Biel for The Good Daughter.
html:
Peacock’s new TV and movie releases for January 6-12 2025 include Deal or No Deal Island Season 2 and The Traitors Season 3.

Deal or No Deal Island Season 2 makes its way to Peacock on January 8. Hosted by actor Joe Manganiello, this reality game show sees contestants take part in a series of tough challenges. They have to find hidden briefcases worth over $200 million, before facing the banker himself in the ultimate challenge. The winner is the person who has managed to defeat the banker and receives the ultimate cash prize.

Then, on January 9, the first three episodes of The Traitors Season 3 drop on Peacock. This game show is hosted by Alan Cumming at an ancient Scottish castle. Here, contestants called “faithfuls” work together in a series of challenges to build a prize fund worth $250,000. They must also contend with some contestants hidden amongst faithfuls, branded “traitors,” whose goal is to eliminate them and claim the prize money for themselves.

Also dropping this week on Peacock is Polar Opposites. This Hallmark movie follows Emma, who ends up traveling to South America, with the ultimate goal of reaching Antarctica to see her father. Unable to get on a boat to Antarctica, she stows away on a cruise ship, where she meets the engineer, Andy.

New Peacock releases for January 6-12 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Peacock from January 6-12 2025.

January 6

  • When Calls The Heart, Season 12 – Premiere

January 7

  • Snapped – Season 35 – Premiere (Oxygen)
  • Watch What Happens Live, Season 22 – Premiere (Bravo)

January 8

  • Deal or No Deal Island, Season 2 – Premiere (NBC)
  • Deal or No Deal Island After Show, Season 1 – Premiere (NBC) 

January 9

  • The Traitors – Season 3 Premiere, 3 Episodes

January 10

  • The Jane Mysteries: A Deadly Prescription

January 12

  • Polar Opposites

For more Peacock content, here is the trailer for Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy. Also, here is who has replaced Jessica Biel for The Good Daughter.
